channel.title: p2p on Max Inden
channel.description: Recent content in p2p on Max Inden

item.title: Hole punching in libp2p
item.description: We have been working on hole punching support in libp2p for the last year. It finally landed in the Go and Rust libp2p implementation. Read all about it on the IPFS blog: https://blog.ipfs.io/2022-01-20-libp2p-hole-punching/
